title: President of the European Central Bank - Wikipedia
snippet: Mario Draghi was chosen to become the next President of the ECB on 24 June 2011. Draghi was president from 1 November 2011 until 31 October 2019 (succeeded by Christine Lagarde). title: Christine Lagarde appointed President of the European Central Bank - Consilium
snippet: Christine Lagarde will replace the outgoing President, Mario Draghi, as of 1 November 2019.

title: European Central Bank - Wikipedia
snippet: In July 2019, EU leaders nominated Christine Lagarde to replace Mario Draghi as ECB President.
